name: Association pour le développement des données sur l'Economie sociale
goal: ADDES is a volonteer association dedicated to the evaluation of the weight, the knowledge about social and solidarity economy -SSE- (social enterprise and social innovation) and the dessimination of this knowledge at a national and a european level. One of these originality is to be a stakeholder association, with reprentant of the national data organization system, members of Social and solidarity economy and reserchers. Addes organize every 18 months, a meeting, distribute a prize for thesis and relevant essays in the field of SSE, and identify thematics of interests for its members
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Social innovation
Business social initiative
Social impact bonds
mapping social enterprises (Nadine Richez-Battesti and Francesca Petrella)
Third social impact (under direction of B. Enjolras)
OCDE : measuring social economy and social enterprise,
